name: enceeper/enceeper-phpconf
description: PHP package for fetching keys from a user account on Enceeper. The main purpose is to be able to store configuration information in the user's safe and have this information delivered to a PHP application.

suggest.php-64bit: PHP 64-bit is required if you plan on testing/using the PHP scrypt implementation.
suggest.enceeper/scrypt: Binary scrypt implementation (in C) to run 20 times faster and consume less memory (you will need to compile the software and provide the path to the executable).
suggest.ext-intl: For utilizing the Normalizer::normalize on passwords and using their NFKD form.
suggest.ext-redis: You will need to install Redis server and the PHP Redis package in order to utilize the RedisCache implementation.
